meanings.definition: To complain or protest about something in a bad-tempered way.
meanings.sent1: She grumbles whenever she has to do her chores.
meanings.sent2: The old man grumbles about the weather every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat grumbles when it doesn't get its favorite treat.
meanings.sent4: The engine grumbles as it struggles up the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: His stomach grumbles loudly during the quiet meeting.

meanings.sent1: The distant grumbles of thunder signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent2: The grumbles of the hungry bear echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The grumbles of the washing machine made a rhythmic background noise.
meanings.sent4: The grumbles of the earthquake shook the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The grumbles of the volcano could be heard from miles away.
